tweets.text: @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency Nick, I live 2 miles from this Landfill and right now a foul odour is coming in to my house despite all windows & doors being firmly shut. The owners are notorious for silencing complaints through legal action they even complained about the MP getting involved to the Tory party!

The @EnvAgency hadn‚Äôt turned them on - it‚Äôs not just the site that‚Äôs starting to stink üò≥
Has news covered this? Surely it‚Äôs a story where questions should be asked of the agency and council? https://t.co/aEgjoNDBUO

Twitter has been so busy tonight that I nearly forgot to send my nightly email of complaint to the @EnvAgency to tell them that yet again the landfill fumes are in my house giving me a sore throat&needing my inhalers while my 3 year old son sleeps breathing these in @BBCPanorama

entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency And this is one of many reasons why the town has no confidence or trust in the @EnvAgency any more, their decisions seem too political to have their vision & values at the heart of their actions, we wonder if it‚Äôs because there is too much money involved

@MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency One weekend at the end of Feb the @EnvAgency received over a thousand complaints as the smell was so bad. They had installed monitoring facilities so we thought at least they'd have the data to prove the problem.....They hadn't turned them on.

@AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids Well done Aaron, the smell is overpowering - it‚Äôs incredible that it‚Äôs allowed, please do whatever you can to bring this awful pungent nightmare to an end.

tweets.text: Hi @PHE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids can we be real here? Residents exposure times are hours, not minutes, and repeatedly for at least 2 years. Can you accurately still say there‚Äôs no harm to human health? P.S how do you sleep at night? Because we can‚Äôt.üò¥ #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Y2RMaMkmJW

We‚Äôve had to leave the area on numerous occasions, if not for being unable to breathe, but for my daughter and unborn baby. Even my manager said how pale I looked today because the gases in my home had me vomiting yet again! @StinkStopthe @sarahbeeny @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/kZbdbnLMLe

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency WHERE IS OUR WATER SAMPLE!!!! #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/i4TMt95Ix7

@RowanN_TandA @bradfordmdc @Bradford_TandA @EnvAgencyYNE @bradfordmdc still hasn't tided up the back of Silverdale Road BD5. I've now seen evidence of rats in my cellar. See footprints in the picture. This city is absolutely filthy. When is the council going to act? https://t.co/5yWyEK7ufJ

Saw this colourful discharge coming out of the Shortlands Sewer screen on the waterworks this morning.

@EnvAgency @LDNWaterkeeper @SaveLeaMarshes https://t.co/c6yaZCa3Nl
